name: Arena (itch)
description:
Arena is a dungeon crawler in gunfight mode with his lot of loot, dodge shots and table shot. The goal is to travel from arena to arena to survive as long as possible.

You will encounter different worlds generated procedurally. You have two weapons on your character. The controls are simple. 

More destroy your enemies, the more your score will increase! It's up to you to do the best score! Objects are hidden everywhere on the map, try to find them to better equip you!

To follow the development of this game join this Discord server : https://discord.gg/ayNzFM7

Warning ! This game is under development! All planned features are not yet implemented! The content is for now very basic, I plan to add a lot of new zones, weapons, items, ennemies, ...
